isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON 2000 SERIES™ (LCT) TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - GROUND SYSTEM

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Series Models
svcsubproc.para: The ground to the TCM is provided on circuit 11-G to connector (426), through circuit A343, dash connector (13), circuit 11G, and TCM/CAB connector (3034). From (3034) the ground is split into circuit 101 & 105 to grey TCM connector (3031) pins 1 & 5.

svcsubproc.title: 3800 Model
svcsubproc.para: The ground to the TCM is provided on circuit 11-G to connector (426), through circuit 11GA and 11GB, splitting to circuit 101 & 105 to grey TCM connector (3031) pins 1 & 5.

svcsubproc.title: 3400 Model
svcsubproc.para: The ground to the TCM is provided on circuit 11-G to connector (426), through circuit 11GA and 11GB, splitting to circuit 101 & 105 to grey TCM connector (3031) pins 1 & 5.
